entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
